p: To determine which outcome would be most appropriate in the follow-up trial, an expert group will be consulted using a Delphi standardised consultation approach. 69 For each participant, it will be established whether ulcers have improved in the time period between inclusion and the primary endpoint. This expert judgement of 'improvement' or not will then be linked to the clinical outcome data that we collected within the trial. We will then assess whether there is a single outcome parameter that can define response or whether composite outcome would be preferred.
